comments.body: This is an 100% optional suggestion—probably not worth doing—of which I have little understanding. But since matrix math is happening here, and "optimized" is in the PR title, just want to point out `Tensor` (based on Eigen) and better yet MKL e.g. [mkl_matmul_op.cc](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/kernels/mkl_matmul_op.cc) (which unlike Eigen doesn't appear to be available in TF builds 100% of thte time) just in case you weren't already aware.
Further note: We have some code in tensorflow/contrib/tensorboard/db/ that might duplicate this code, except probably not? since I think that only applies to encode and not decode.

I'm not sure what TF builds @jart is referring to. I have a hard time imagining a TF build without Eigen, since many of the core classes like ```Tensor``` are thin wrappers over Eigen classes.

In any case, I don't see any matrix math with mentioning here.
